name: Vintage Button Bobby Pin Trio
description:
Just darling.  A touch of pretty without too much fuss.

A set of three vintage buttons attached to silver metal bobby pins.  Good grip, no pinch.  

All pieces are handcrafted with great care and attention to detail. This piece is ready to ship.

Thanks for looking!

name: PinkPunk Feather Hair Clip
description:
A shocking smash of color in this feathery fascinator.  This rare bird (or feather clip, rather) features vibrant hot fuchsia pink dyed pheasant feathers accented with shimmery peacock flues and natural polka dot guinea feathers.  Black netting covers a matte metal button that anchors the piece.

The elements are adhered to a soft wool felt base, which is then attached to a small but sturdy alligator clip, ensuring a good grip in your hair.  Approximately 4 inches in length.

Quick and easy fancy.

This piece is carefully handcrafted with a great attention to detail and quality craftsmanship.

Thanks for looking...

name: Resting Hands of Time Necklace
description:
We've captured the tiny hands of time in a bottle.  Vintage watch parts and a clipping from the old Riley Farm Rhymes are trapped inside a glass bottle and adorned with little key and heart charms.  The 1 inch bottle has been sealed and attached to an antiqued brass chain. 

Made by Parisienne Girl and Deeds & Petunia.  Check out her shop too www.parisiennegirl.com

Thanks for looking...

name: Snowflake Button & Black Feather Fascinator
description:
A simple and sweet little fascinator featuring dyed and hand cut black goose feathers and a darling vintage brass snowflake button. Approximately 3 inches in length.

The feathers are hand stripped and adhered to a soft wool felt base, which is then attached to a small but sturdy alligator clip, ensuring a good grip in your hair.

Quick and easy fancy.

This piece is carefully handcrafted with a great attention to detail and quality craftsmanship.

Thanks for looking...

name: Woodsy Feather Headband
description:
Warm and woodsy.  Great for every day wear.

This headband style fascinator is made from a pheasant feather pad backed by wool felt, accented by a boutique dyed and hand cut peacock eye, coque accent feathers and a lovely cream flower with hand sewn Czech bead center.  Affixed to a slender metal headband - comfortable and stays put in all types of hair.

Quick and easy fancy.

This piece is carefully handcrafted with a great attention to detail and quality craftsmanship.  

Thanks for looking...
